alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 8:23PM CDT until September 06 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR CHICKASAW...SOUTHERN CALHOUN AND SOUTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 822 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Okolona to near Montpelier to 7 miles south of Vardaman, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aberdeen, Houston, Okolona, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Slate Springs, Prairie, Pyland, Trebloc, Houlka, New Houlka, Big Creek, Woodland, Thorn, Egypt, Loyd, Thelma and McCondy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
